text:
"Grand Theft Auto V" is an action-adventure video game that was made and released by Rockstar Games. It is the fifteenth game in the "Grand Theft Auto" video game series. The game was released all around the world on 17 September 2013 on Playstation 3 and Xbox 360. In 2014, Rockstar Games released Grand Theft Auto V on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
In 2015, the game was released for Microsoft Windows. The game has sold 120 million copies, making it the second best-selling game of all time.
